languages.text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +10% for every instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} it suffers.

traits.locale_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} by +10% for every instance of damage it suffers.

languages.text: 每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}都会提高10%，效果持续1个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物受到伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}都会提高10%，效果持续1个{/g}回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}。

languages.text: На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо увеличивает свою {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 10% за каждый случай получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +10% for every instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} it suffers.

traits.locale_text: На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо увеличивает свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 10% за каждый случай получения урона.
На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо увеличивает свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 10% за каждый случай получения урона.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の発生ごとに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+10%増加する。
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +10% for every instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} it suffers.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、この生物はダメージを受けるたびに{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が＋10％増加する。

languages.text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} un +10 % cada vez que recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature increases its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +10% for every instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} it suffers.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} un +10 % cada vez que recibe daño.

languages.text: Erleidet diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, erhöht sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um +10 %.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhöht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang immer wenn sie Schaden nimmt ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} um +10 %.

languages.text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de cette créature augmente de +10 % par instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'elle subit.
